text: 16.19: Mt 18.18; Zo 20.23Gu Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi garim, mbe ana piin ki ŋgu Hevenan thɨma fhɨri kii, gu ana ndun nɨɨŋgirga. Ndu kha nɨɨn kama shogip suaŋgirga kameŋ, Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra Hevenan mba kameŋ ndi tɨgɨrga. Ndu kha nuianan kama shogip tharga bigeŋ, Fhe Bakɨme vhɨra Hevenan mba kameŋ tharga.”
